Values.Text: CODEX

Mothman

Mothman is a little shit that hangs around the forests at night. He will terrorize people who bother him, and be generally antagonistic, but he's not known to kill people very often.

Mothman

His main ability is that anyone who looks into his large glowing red eyes is struck with such terrible fear that they often find themselves unable to do much or defend themselves.

Werewolves

Werewolves are dangerous creatures, unable to control their urges and actions, they transform from normal humans to monsters at night and roam looking for victims.

Werewolves

Werewolves cannot be killed by normal weapons while in their wolf form, but in human form are perfectly normal.

Mahamba

The Mahamba appears similar to a giant crocodile, reaching lengths of up to 40 feet long. It eats almost anything in its territory, though typically avoids anything of a similar size.

Mahamba

The Mahamba’s behavior changes entirely when its children are threatened, as it has a very aggressive paternal instinct.

Nguma-monene

Nguma-monene is a long snake-like creature with short stubby legs and a serrated ridge along its spine. It hunts everywhere in whatever body of water it inhabits.

Nguma-monene

It mostly targets large fish and fauna that swim too far from the coast. All nguma-monene are survivors, once the eggs are laid, the adult nguma-monene will leave its children to fend for themselves.

Skeljaskrimsli

The Skeljaskrimsli, or Shell Monster for short, is a huge bear-like hippo with blue scales and long claws. It’s a fearsome predator, living in the deepest parts of the sea.

Skeljaskrimsli

It is fiercely territorial, challenging anything big enough that crosses its path. Luckily, due to the depth of its home, contact with it is unlikely.

Kraken

Krakens come in many different shapes and sizes. The key similarities in each of their reported sightings is the kraken’s enormous tentacles.

Kraken

.It uses them to drag whole ships down, where it devours anything onboard with an enormous beak. Krakens are large, and many ships nowadays are equipped to spot and avoid them

Capelobo

The Capelobo is a creature about the size of a human, noted for its main characteristics it shares with anteaters. Used to be most commonly seen lurking in wooded areas near small villages.

Capelobo

Preying on any pets or children that wander too far. Its whip-like tongue used to ensnare and crush its prey, doing the same to crack open the skull and consume the brain.

Capelobo

In recent years this creature has become increasingly more rare due to people hunting it to near extinction.

Wendigo

The Wendigo is a creature that ranges from the size of a human to up to 15 ft tall. Commonly described as looking like a feral deer standing on its hind legs.

Wendigo

They are known to be extremely aggressive and will tear apart anything they encounter. A few believe that the Wendigo was a forest spirit that became corrupted and now seeks vengeance.

Skinwalker

The Skinwalker can take on the form of any animal it desires, with slight deformations. They have been noted to have a very nomadic nature.

Skinwalker

They move often in order to hunt whatever they can get their hands on. While not known to target humans, they have been known to do so when food becomes too scarce in the area.

Gjenganger

Gjenganger are spirits who often stay stuck in our world for a variety of reasons, but the most common are that they died with serious regrets, or they were buried improperly.

Gjenganger

When they return they have the ability to form a corporeal body from the remains of their old body.

Gjenganger

They use this corporeal form to directly try and either act on their regrets or enact revenge against those who wronged them.

Myling

Myling are spirits who crawl from their graves if where they were buried was not favored by the deceased, they will go and track down whoever they may blame.

Myling

They try to convince humans to take them to the proper place to be laid to rest. Should the person refuse, the Myling becomes incredibly agitated and may try and claw them to death.

Dybbukr

Dybbuk spirits are malicious people who died before a goal of theirs could be finished, and return to complete their goal in death.

Dybbuk

The Dybbuk is able to possess people, forcing them to do their bidding for a time, depending on the willpower of the possessed person.
